text.__SUMMARY__: Gymnopilus lutescens is a species of mushroom in the Cortinariaceae family.
text.Description:
The cap is 4 to 6 centimetres (1.6 to 2.4 in) in diameter.
Microscopic characteristics
text.Habitat and distribution: Gymnopilus lutescens grows on hardwood. It has been collected in Michigan, in July.
